page.title: 02Population.
page.content: Our area has a great variety of people in it.Lots of local characters,like one of our school favourites,Mrs Purdy ,who is 82 and comes in to school regularly to talk to us especially about Brinsley in the past.Another favourite is P.C Lomax who is our local policeman.We all know him well and like him a lot.Many of the local people have worked in the mines in the past but these are know closing down and the people will either retire,find alternative employment or sadly join our ever-growing dole queue.There are a number of self employed people.Brinsley enjoys a good community spirit with many of our mums and dads organising local clubs and events.The local primary school(our school) has lots of links with the communities,the church,the older people and with life in general...
